title: [Large-scale] Task-Centered Job Competency Enhancement Program for Low-Sodium Diet Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nutrition knowledge and understanding of chronic disease management concepts
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based online learning environment emphasizing practical low-sodium meal planning and self-management skills

learning_goals: Learners can maintain daily sodium intake below 2,000mg for three months after training completion.
Learners can complete practical tasks by applying a three-step process to design low-sodium diets in workplace settings.
Improve self-monitoring skills by over 80% through weekly meal journaling and urine test analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
